1.interact_text_1st_to_2nd: Dive into the deep pool of slime leading north
1.interact_text_2nd_to_1st: Dive into the deep pool of slime leading south
1.log_text_1st_to_2nd:
You dive into

the deep slime pool

. After a long and terrifying swim through the submerged cave you emerge in a pitch black grotto.
1.log_text_2nd_to_1st:
You jump back into

the slime pool

. You emerge in a slimy grotto.

2.interact_text_1st_to_2nd: Climb into the cave leading south
2.interact_text_2nd_to_1st: Climb back into the cave leading north
2.log_text_1st_to_2nd:
You squeeze yourself through

the tight cave opening

. You emerge on the other side.
2.log_text_2nd_to_1st:
You head back into

the cave

. You emerge in a grotto.

3.interact_text_1st_to_2nd: Head westwards on the path through the trees
3.interact_text_2nd_to_1st: Head eastwards on the path through the trees
